title: Unspervised operation
text: Streamline process allows you to gather and process samples without human interaction

title: Powerful data extraction
text: Aleph extracts threat-relevant data from samples and index them into searchable datasets

title: Extract data from data
text: Metadata such as URLs and domains gets retrofed into the pipeline for data extraction and correlation

title: Beautiful data visualization
text: Visualize data as graphs, histograms and more. Correlate samples. Understand the patterns

title: All your tools, combined
text: Aleph processors aim to perform as well as their standalone counterparts, in one place, automatically

title: Intelligence analysis
text: Perform automated intelligence analysis by combining data from multiple processors
